skins.shipDescription: Nagara-class light cruiser number five C Kinu.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Nagara-class light cruiser, Kinu. My name derives from Kinugawa, meaning "furious and violent like a demon's wrath." I live up to my name, but trust me - that is not something that you would want to see.
skins.acquisition: I'm Kinu. If you want this demon to do your bidding, then you'd better show me what you're capable of!
skins.login: Hurry up and make today's plans.
skins.details: You're welcome to inspect the other stuff, but you'd be best off not casually touching my demonic raiments.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Somebody I can't stand? I guess that'd be Nagara. She's theC Whuah, Nagara?! W-Wait, don't get any closer! MMPH, URMMMPHHH!
skins.secretaryIdle2: A new model of oxygen torpedo...? I say, do get me one of those. I promise I'll draw out every bit of its power.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My cloak's pretty cool? Heh~ you think so too, huh? ...Hey, stop trying to slack off!
skins.secretaryTouch: You want to duel me? Don't worry, I'll give you a handicap.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Really? Are you trying to get me mad?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Don't go around touching my head.

skins.shipDescription: Retrofit complete... Look forward to commanding the might of the demon ascended. I shall not disappoint you!
skins.acquisition: Retrofit complete... Look forward to commanding the might of the demon ascended. I shall not disappoint you!
skins.details: My oni mask? Ah, it's on the other side now. With my self-evident power, there is no need to flaunt such things.
skins.secretaryIdle1: This time, I won't resign myself to obsolescence!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Darn that Aoba... With how she's always absent-mindedly flitting about, what is she going to do when she ends up in actual danger?
skins.secretaryIdle3: This mantle was specifically made for me. See, look here, and here as well... Gah! ...Ahem! Sorry, I got carried away. I just wanted to make sure you knew.
skins.secretaryTouch: If you want to spar with me, you'd better think thrice. One slip of the hand, and it won't be just a flesh wound that we're dealing with.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ugh... I'm still a woman, you know! Have you no sense of decency?!

skins.shipDescription: Grr! What are you here for? Speak up. ...Oh, you just wanted to take a tour of the club activities? Sorry 'bout that, I don't like getting disturbed in the middle of this kind of training.
skins.acquisition: Grr! What are you here for? Speak up. ...Oh, you just wanted to take a tour of the club activities? Sorry 'bout that, I don't like getting disturbed in the middle of this kind of training.
skins.login: Just finished my daily practice swings. Time to get back to work.
skins.details: What Takao is doing can't be considered a club activity... No, I didn't mean anything by it. I just do what I like.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Unless you are a genius, you can never depart from the fundamentals. Even if you are a genius, you cannot afford to neglect the fundamentals either. That is the nature of swordsmanship.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Prince of Wales and Repulse, huh? ...Hmph. I'd never call them cowards.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Isuzu clearly is also an oni, but she's somehow afraid of ghosts. Me...? Guh, I suppose I can't deny that...!
skins.secretaryTouch: These little manjuu hardly make for good sparring partners. How about taking their place?
